name: ASUS ROG Maximus XIII Motherboard
description: The ASUS ROG Maximus XIII is a high-end motherboard designed for gamers and enthusiasts. It features a robust power delivery system and advanced cooling options.

name: Corsair Vengeance RGB Pro RAM
description: The Corsair Vengeance RGB Pro RAM is a high-performance memory module with RGB lighting. It is available in various capacities and speeds.

name: Intel Core i9-11900K Processor
description: The Intel Core i9-11900K is a powerful processor with a base clock speed of 3.5GHz and a maximum turbo frequency of 5.3GHz. It has 16 cores and 32 threads.

name: Seasonic PRIME TX-850 Power Supply
description: The Seasonic PRIME TX-850 is a high-efficiency power supply with a 850W capacity. It features a full modular design and a silent mode for quiet operation.

name: Logitech G Pro Wireless Gaming Mouse
description: The Logitech G Pro Wireless Gaming Mouse is a high-performance wireless gaming mouse with a 16000 DPI sensor. It features a lightweight design and customizable buttons.

name: Corsair K95 RGB Platinum XT Keyboard
description: The Corsair K95 RGB Platinum XT is a high-end mechanical keyboard with Cherry MX Speed RGB switches. It features a durable aluminum frame and per-key RGB lighting.

name: Sennheiser GSP 600 Gaming Headset
description: The Sennheiser GSP 600 is a high-performance gaming headset with a closed-back design. It features a noise-cancelling microphone and 7.1 surround sound.
